overview: The Decks Ran Red (also called Infamy) is a 1958 M-G-M sea-going suspense drama based on the book Infamy at Sea, and directed by Andrew L. Stone. The feature starred, James Mason, Dorothy Dandridge, Broderick Crawford, and Stuart Whitman.
tagline: They murdered her man â€¦ and now she was at the mercy of the love-starved crew of the Berwind!
title: The Decks Ran Red
